transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning, bolo.
Executive: Noman baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan, bataiye.
Executive: Woh aapko kya kehte hain TDS refund chahiye tha toh aapne mujhe phone hi nahi kiya na mujhe certificate bheja.
Customer: Kiska?
Executive: Veer Thermoplast ka.
Customer: Woh kya hai Rajesh bhai sambhalte hai sab, main nahi sambhalta hun office work, woh marketing sambhalta hun, pata nahi hai aap kaunsi baat kar rahe ho.
Executive: Achha, unhe TDS wapas chahiye tha Veer Thermoplast ka, toh aapke office mein koi Aakash aata hai aapki dusri firm ke liye.
Customer: Haan, haan, Aakash aata hai.
Executive: Toh unhone uske liye share kar diya hai use.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh wohi main kahun, maine kaha ki sir ke paas toh mera number bhi tha toh aap mujhe bata dete toh main hi kara deta.
Customer: Toh kya hai ki office work main nahi sambhalta hun, Rajesh bhai karke sambhalte hai.
Executive: Aapke bade bhai hai?
Customer: Haan, mere bade bhai hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Woh tabhi, tabhi unhone unhe de diya woh, koi baat nahi woh main kara deta hun, iske liye agar mujhe check ki need padegi toh main de dunga, baki abhi lead wagera kaisi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Main, main, zara sa bhi nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Pura zara sa bhi nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji sir, ek minute.
Customer: Abhi main toh, maine toh woh maine unko bola hai ki pure paise wapas kar do jitna hota hai utna apne ko IndiaMART ke saath kaam hi nahi karna hai, apne aisa bhi bola hai unko.
Executive: Kyun sir?
Customer: Kyunki koi lead generate toh hoti hai lekin hamare paas toh aati nahi hai, generate mein dekhte hai toh kitni sari lead generate hoti hai, hamare paas toh aati hi nahi, aati nahi hai toh phir aapko paise dene ka kya matlab hai?
Executive: Nahi, jo bhi lead generate hoti hai.
Customer: Main is baar office gaya tha, main is baar office gaya tha toh maine na hi bol diya tha kyunki main dekh raha hun mera number hai mere mein aati hai, main dekhta hun kabhi kabhi application mere mein.
Customer: Generate bahut sari hoti hai lekin hamare mein toh aati hi nahi hai.
Executive: Toh kya karne ka woh sab?
Executive: Sari lead aapko jo lead portal pe aati hai woh aapko bhi show hoti hai, aisa nahi hai ki woh alag dikhegi.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi hoti hai, nahi hoti hai, galat baat hai, aap mere saath pure din aake baitho main yeh bol raha hun.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Mere saath subah se leke shaam tak kisi koi bhi bande ko aake bhej do.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Main tayar hun baithne ke liye.
Executive: Woh lead hi nahi show hoti aapko?
Customer: Lead aata hi nahi hai, generate hoti hai usme se koi bhi hamare mein nahi aati hai.
Executive: Jaise aapne.
Customer: Pehle aati thi thode din, abhi thode paise bhi diye the pehle jab jab jab chalu kiya tha tab thode din aayi, phir abhi toh aati nahi hai strapping machine ki aati hai thodi bahut lead baki generate jo strapping strap ki hai woh generate mein dekhte hai toh usme toh bahut sari aati hai lekin hamare paas mein nahi aati hai.
Executive: Nahi abhi lead dikha rahi hai pet strap karke ek 34 minute pehle ki yeh lead aapko nahi show hui hai, sold out ho gayi hai.
Customer: Pet strap.
Customer: Nahi hui hai.
Executive: Pet strap 80 kilo.
Customer: Nahi hui hai.
Executive: Yeh bhi nahi dikhi aapko lead, strapping machine, box strapping machine.
Customer: Nahi dikhi.
Customer: Nahi strapping machine ki aayi thi woh nahi, woh toh aayi thi woh dekhi thi, kaunsi thi exact woh pata nahi hai lekin strapping machine ki toh dikhi thi, baki jo generate hui hai na usme se generate mein jitni batate hai na usme se 5% nahi shayad 2% bhi nahi mere ko dikhti hai.
Executive: Achha do.
Customer: Maine unko bola hai woh Aakash bhai karke aate hai unko bolo ki yeh kaam kaaj sahi nahi hai aapka mere paise wapas de do mere ko nahi kaam karna IndiaMART ke saath, bol di diya hai maine unko.
Customer: Is baar office gaya tha toh bol ke aaya hun ki inke saath kaam karne ka apne ko koi fayda hi nahi hai kyunki yeh log humko toh dete nahi hai jo jyada paise dete hai unko dete hai toh phir kya karne ka?
Executive: Nahi nahi aisa bhi nahi hai, aapko.
Customer: Are main yeh bol raha hun sir ji aap, aap main yeh bol raha hun ki aap ek kaam karo pure din mere saath baitho.
Executive: Nahi agar.
Customer: Pure din mein aap jitne din bolo na utne din mein aapke saath baithne ko aap, aap jo bolo na woh woh open karke main aapke saath baithne ke liye tayar hun, planning karke mere ko bolo bas.
Executive: Main samajh gaya.
Customer: Aap aa jao main aa jata hun.
Customer: Generate toh bahut sari hoti hai hamare paas aati nahi hai, iska matlab yahi hai woh woh banda hai na woh apna ghar ka hai main samajhta hun, woh hamare saath company ka kaam karta hai, jo jyada rupay dete hai na unko hi dete ho aap woh baat bhi fix hi hai.
Customer: Jo jo kam rupay deta hai unko kuch nahi dete ho aap, khali paise leke bas woh rakhte ho, wohi hai.
Executive: Nahi sir dekhiye jitne jitna paisa diya.
Customer: Main yeh guarantee deta hun sir aap ek kaam karo mere saath subah se leke shaam tak nahi jitna din bolo na utna din main baithne ke liye tayar hun, mera PC, mera phone dono leke baithne ko tayar hun.
Customer: Agar aap tayar ho toh baith jao chalo main yeh bol raha hun, kitne percent mere mein aati hai na aap tayar ho toh baith jao chalo.
Executive: Main toh deta hun yeh jo aap bata rahe hain, mujhe ek bataiye.
Customer: Aapka apne ko zara sa bhi pasand nahi aaya sir jo bhi hai woh dil se baat karunga main.
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Kyunki toh thode din hua aisa badi badi baatein hui na tab aisa lag raha tha.
Customer: Baki abhi zara sa bhi pasand nahi aaya hai.
Customer: Lead aati nahi hai kya paisa dene ka kya fayda hai yeh sab?
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Aur woh baat bhi fix hi hai jo log jyada rupay dete hai unko hi aap dete ho baki kisi ko nahi dete ho.
Executive: Aisa.
Customer: Aapko complaint likhna hai toh complaint likh lo jo bhi karna hai woh likh lo main bol raha hun tabhi.
Executive: Theek hai likh lete hain.
Customer: Aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main keh raha hun woh toh theek hai likh leta hun.
Customer: Bas.
Customer: Nahi baki lead generate toh bahut sari hoti hai usme se hamare paas koi bhi nahi aati hai, main dekhta hun na jo generate hui hui pata hi nahi chali jati hai ki kya hota hai usme kin kin ko aap dete ho matlab yeh generate hoti hai woh kitne logo ko jati hai bataye na aap log.
Executive: Paanch log, paanch.
Customer: Toh usme hamara number kab aayega yeh bataiye aap.
Executive: Sir sabko lead same time pe dikhati hai jo pehle paanch consume kar lete hai unko ho jati baki sold out ho jati hai.
Customer: Hmm toh hai.
Customer: Hamare mein toh aati hi nahi hai, main bol raha hun na baith lo mere saath main yeh bol raha hun.
Executive: Chaliye main dekhta hun ek baar aap jaisa bol rahe hain.
Customer: Agar hota hai toh band kar do apna main toh yeh bhi bolne ke liye tayar hun apna paisa wapas de do jitna nikalta hai utna apne ko kaam bhi nahi karna hai, agar ready ho toh woh bhi bata dena mere ko.
Executive: Nahi sir aisa nahi hai ki.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan toh baith jao mere saath jo bhi, haan toh solution la ke do mere ko main yeh bol raha hun sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants TDS refund for Veer Thermoplast.

- No leads are being generated.

- Wants to discontinue services with IndiaMART.

- Believes higher-paying clients get preferential treatment.



Resolution:

- Executive will look into the lead generation issue.

- Executive will look into the TDS refund.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will investigate the lead generation issue.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, tds, subscription
